required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Survey Study: Financial Impact of Breast Cancer Treatment
clinical_study.official_title: Determining the Financial Impact of Breast Cancer Treatment Over a One Year Period for Patients at a Rural Cancer Center

brief_summary.textblock: A survey study to evaluate the financial impact of breast cancer as self-reported by breast cancer patients over a period of 1 year. The study will also look at the health insurance literacy and patient's utilization of support services.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in level of self-reported financial burden
primary_outcome.description: Will evaluate the change in Comprehensive Score for Financial Toxicity (COST-FACIT) measurements from baseline to 1 year follow up. This survey consists of 14 questions related to finances.Responses include 5 options with lower scores representing worse outcomes. Scores at 1 year will be compared to baseline scores.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in level of self-reported health insurance literacy
secondary_outcome.description: Will evaluate the change in Health Insurance Literacy Measurements (HILM) from baseline to 1 year follow up

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-reported access and utilization of institutional support services
secondary_outcome.description: Will evaluate reported access and utilization of institutional support services and its association to financial burden in the first 12 months after enrollment.

intervention.description: Patients with breast cancer diagnosis complete questionnaires over 20-30 minutes at baseline and at 3, 6, and 12 months after enrollment.

study_pop.textblock: Patients seen at rural cancer center with diagnosis of breast cancer or a recurrence of breast cancer within the past 2 years

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 years or older
- Diagnosed with breast cancer or a recurrence of breast cancer within the past 2 years
- Willing to sign consent
- Able to read and complete surveys in English
Exclusion Criteria:
- Cancer diagnosis other than breast cancer
- More than 2 years since diagnosis with breast cancer or recurrence

overall_official.last_name: Cynthia Perry-Keaty, RN, MS, FNP-BC, AOCNP

investigator.last_name: Cynthia Perry-Keaty, RN, MS, FNP-BC, AOCNP
